TopicTitle: BUG: Lower-stage engines stealing fuel across decoupler

Articles.Content: In this video at 57:25, I decoupled my rocket, and discovered that the upper stage of the rocket had no fuel. It looks like maybe all the fuel was consumed by the lower stage before separation, even though nothing connects them except the decoupler. I didn't fiddle with the decoupler settings at all, so there's no way I could have enabled cross-feed (if that's even possible with decouplers).
